snippet: A new round of subpoenas requesting information indicates that federal prosecutors are intensifying their efforts to build a case against the hedge fund SAC.
abstract: A new round of subpoenas requesting information indicates that federal prosecutors are intensifying their efforts to build a case against the hedge fund SAC.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: SAC Starts to Balk Over Insider Trading Inquiry
headline.print_headline:
As Trading Inquiry Escalates,
Big Hedge Fund Starts to Balk
